Text: EPE MARKETING AVAILABILITY Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Marketing personnel will again be taking call on weekends and holidays The extension will be forwarded to EPEs prescheduling personnel and unit commitment plans will be developed over the weekend Please call me at or Pete Serrano at if questions arise Please share this with other personnel as appropriate

EPE MARKETING AVAILABILITY Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst As of today the marketing personnel will no longer be on call on the weekends The extension will be forwarded to Enron along with the extension There will be no preschedules or unit commitment plans developed over the weekend Such preschedules and unit commitment plans will be generated on Friday or the day before the holiday until further notice Please call me at or Pete Serrano at if questions arise Please share this with other personnel as appropriate
